languages.text: {n}В вокс-канале слышен тонкий вздох, полный осознания и... испуга?{/n} "Элантах... я знаю, в чем причина безумия Маражая. Прошу, я должна отправиться в отсек вместе с тобой. Я помогу тебе совладать с Темным".

traits.locale_text: {n}В вокс-канале слышен тонкий вздох, полный осознания и... испуга?{/n} "Элантах... я знаю, в чем причина безумия Маражая. Прошу, я должна отправиться в отсек вместе с тобой. Я тоже слышу эти голоса... и я знаю, как помочь моему темному собрату".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}The vox-channel relays a thin sigh, full of realisation... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason behind Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to the compartment. I will help you deal with the Dark One."
languages.original_text: {n}В вокс-канале слышен тонкий вздох, полный осознания и... испуга?{/n} "Элантах... я знаю, в чем причина безумия Маражая. Прошу, я должна отправиться в отсек вместе с тобой. Я помогу тебе совладать с Темным".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox-channel relays a high-pitched sigh, full of realization... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason for Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to this compartment. I too can hear these voices... And I know how to help my dark kinsman."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox-channel relays a high-pitched sigh, full of realization... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason for Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to this compartment. I too can hear these voices... And I know how to help my dark kinsman."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox-channel relays a thin sigh, full of realisation... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason behind Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to the compartment. I will help you deal with the Dark One."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox-channel relays a thin sigh, full of realisation... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason behind Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to the compartment. I will help you deal with the Dark One."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox-channel relays a thin sigh, full of realisation... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason behind Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to the compartment. I will help you deal with the Dark One."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}音阵频道中传来了细微的叹息声，充满了理解……与恐惧？{/n}“外界人……我知道玛拉斋为什么会发疯。请让我陪你一起前往船舱吧，我会协助你对付黑暗子嗣。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-channel relays a thin sigh, full of realisation... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason behind Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to the compartment. I will help you deal with the Dark One."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵频道中传来了细微的叹息声，充满了理解……与恐惧？{/n}“外界人……我知道玛拉斋为什么会发疯。请让我陪你一起前往船舱吧，我会协助你对付黑暗子嗣。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le canal-vox diffuse un léger soupir qui semble exprimer une prise de conscience... et de l'effroi ?{/n} « Elantach... Je sais pourquoi Marazhai a sombré dans la folie. Laissez-moi vous accompagner sur place, je vous prie. Je vous aiderai à faire face au Drukhari. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-channel relays a thin sigh, full of realisation... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason behind Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to the compartment. I will help you deal with the Dark One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le canal-vox diffuse un léger soupir qui semble exprimer une prise de conscience... et de l'effroi ?{/n} « Elantach... Je sais pourquoi Marazhai a sombré dans la folie. Laissez-moi vous accompagner sur place, je vous prie. Je vous aiderai à faire face au Drukhari. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}El canal de voco emite un breve suspiro que denota comprensión y... ¿miedo?{/n} «Elantach... sé por qué Marazhai ha enloquecido. Por favor, déjeme acompañar{mf|lo|la} al compartimento. Le ayudaré a enfrentarse al Oscuro».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-channel relays a thin sigh, full of realisation... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason behind Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to the compartment. I will help you deal with the Dark One."

traits.locale_text: {n}El canal de voco emite un breve suspiro que denota comprensión y... ¿miedo?{/n} «Elantach... sé por qué Marazhai ha enloquecido. Por favor, déjeme acompañar{mf|lo|la} al compartimento. Le ayudaré a enfrentarse al Oscuro».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ヴォクス通信からは悟ったような、怯えたような、小さなため息がもれた。{/n}「エランタ…マラズハイの狂気の理由がわかった。頼む、コンパートメントまで同行させて欲しい。闇の者を始末するのを手伝うつもりだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-channel relays a thin sigh, full of realisation... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason behind Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to the compartment. I will help you deal with the Dark One."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクス通信からは悟ったような、怯えたような、小さなため息がもれた。{/n}「エランタ…マラズハイの狂気の理由がわかった。頼む、コンパートメントまで同行させて欲しい。闇の者を始末するのを手伝うつもりだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Vox-Kanal gibt einen dünnen Seufzer aus. Er klingt, als würde jemand ein tiefes Verständnis haben ... und Angst?{/n} "Elantach ... Ich kenne den Grund für Marazhais Wahnsinn. Bitte lasst mich Euch zum Abteil begleiten. Ich werde Euch helfen, mit dem Dunklen klarzukommen."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-channel relays a thin sigh, full of realisation... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason behind Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to the compartment. I will help you deal with the Dark One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Vox-Kanal gibt einen dünnen Seufzer aus. Er klingt, als würde jemand ein tiefes Verständnis haben ... und Angst?{/n} "Elantach ... Ich kenne den Grund für Marazhais Wahnsinn. Bitte lasst mich Euch zum Abteil begleiten. Ich werde Euch helfen, mit dem Dunklen klarzukommen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Voks kanalından bir ses, hafifçe iç çekiyor. Tonunda farkındalık var, bir de... Dehşet mi o?{/n} "Elantach... Marazhai'ın neden delirdiğini biliyorum. Ne olur müsaade et de seninle kompartımana geleyim. Kara'nın icabına birlikte bakalım."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-channel relays a thin sigh, full of realisation... and fright?{/n} "Elantach... I know what the reason behind Marazhai's madness is. Please, I must accompany you to the compartment. I will help you deal with the Dark One."
